item.description:
Join us at Lucia's Ristorante & Bar in the hear of the North End. It has been a North End Institution since 1977. It has delicious food and a great atmosphere.

http://www.luciaboston.com/

After dinner, we will be head to the Living Room for drinks. Each member pays for their own food/drink. Please bring cash as they will not split up the bill for large parties. We look forward to seeing you for a fun night!

RSVP Note. Please only sign up if you can definitely attend as this will be a popular event. Please do not sign up just to hold your spot without knowing if you can definitely attend. If your plans change, please be sure to update your RSVP as soon as possible.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the bar at 6:45
item.name: Celebrate Spring with a Dinner in the North End
